version_description: Bug fixes and UI clean up
Bug fixes and UI clean up

-Push notifications.
-Stay up to date with new job opportunities and benefits through Steady Activity feed.
-Access to real-time job availability and updates.
-Social updates: what other users are enjoying on the platform.
-Benefits: Rewards and discounts at relevant retailers. For instance, access to low-cost prescriptions.

-Push notifications.
-Stay up to date with new job opportunities and benefits through Steady Activity feed.
-Access to real-time job availability and updates.
-Social updates: what other users are enjoying on the platform.
-Benefits: Rewards and discounts at relevant retailers. For instance, access to low-cost prescriptions.
-Bug Fixes
-Bug Fixes

We read your reviews, weighed your feedback, and took action! With this version we fixed bugs and updated important product features. Keep leaving your feedback, reporting issues, and sending good vibes. We're listening, learning, and always correcting! Thank you.

At Steady, we are working hard to improve our features so we can help you find ways to make more money and track your income.

We value your opinion. Please reach out to us help@steadyapp.com at any time. Thank you.

At Steady, we are working hard to improve our features so we can help you find ways to make more money and track your income.

We value your opinion. Please reach out to us help@steadyapp.com at any time. Thank you.

Steady’s fast growth is putting the power of technology and information into the hands of the worker, with the goal of leveling the playing field for the modern worker. Every new user makes the platform more powerful for every other Steady user -- and that helps direct us to develop more and more tools to help the Steady community. We are listening. You asked for more opportunities to work from home, so we added more. In addition, we also are:

--Adding thousands of new part-time jobs and shift work every day.
--Optimizing your time with our new, improved dashboard where you can quickly filter new income opportunities based on your location, experience and preferences.
--Making it easier for you to connect to our income tracker so we can help our system get smarter and do our job better at building for you the best possibilities to improve your financial life.

We value your opinion! Please reach out to us at help@steadyapp.com

* Better messaging for Facebook Login requirements
* Crashes from ‘Forgot Password’

Steady has been hard at work on this important and notable release. Here's what's new:
* We've migrated to the React Native platform so we can be quicker and more agile developers.
* Removed the Discovery Feed.
* The Deals tab is native and full of cash-back offers from our select Steady partners.
* We have removed the survey, but only for the time being while we make it better.
* Added a very important security patch to keep things safe and secure.

We have much, much more coming soon to help the American worker!

We value your opinions. Please reach out to us at help@steadyapp.com

Welcome to the new Steady Homepage! Now right from the homepage you can:
- View our job categories
- See our top money-making Income Boosters
- Track your income and link your bank accounts
- Access your profile

Check out the new and improved Booster experience and start earning cash today! Tons of work has been done to Steady's Income Booster feature to bring you more partners, more offers, and more opportunities to be rewarded
- View cashback offers vertically
- View non-cashback offers horizontally
- Open a Boosters card and see a transparent overview of the offer

Check out the new and improved Booster experience and start earning cash today! Tons of work has been done to Steady's Income Booster feature to bring you more partners, more offers, and more opportunities to be rewarded

- View non-cashback offers horizontally
- Open a Boosters card and see a transparent overview of the offer

With the holiday season fast approaching, we've improved our Income Booster experience to help you earn even more extra income and find valuable offers. Our list of partners and opportunities is always growing so keep checking in to see which ones are best for you.

Help us make our app better by sending your feedback and suggestions to help@steadyapp.com.

The holidays are around the corner, let's help you find some extra work for the giving season! We made it easier for you to track which of your Income Boosters are in progress, and which have been completed. We've also added some extra information to help you understand why the Income Boosters and Offers are important for you.

Help us make Steady better by sending your feedback and suggestions to help@steadyapp.com.

We are excited to introduce the Financial Stability Plan! Create your personalized plan in under two minutes and start your journey to increase your income and improve your financial health. Financial stability may seem like it’s out of reach, but it doesn’t have to be. Steady is here to help.

Just as much as we want to help you, we’d love for you to help us. Please send suggestions and feedback to help@steadyapp.com.

We hope everyone is staying healthy and safe. We're excited to announce a big new feature to help our members. Now, you can choose to get your Steady bonus cash deposited directly into your bank account when you complete an Income Booster! Many of our Income Boosters can be done from the comfort of your home and will help you earn and save.

Just as much as we want to help you, we'd love for you to help us. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com

To help our members through these difficult times, we have made it easy to access all the high demand and work from home jobs with a single tap. Also, the improved "Income" feature will help you track your income, bank accounts, provide insights and more, all in one place. Many more good things are coming your way soon. Until then, stay safe!

Just as much as we want to help you, we'd love for you to help us. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com

In these difficult times, it’s important that all our members have access to medical care. Steady is bringing licensed physicians and medical professionals to your fingertips through the addition of Steady Benefits. Members can now access online medical visits (telehealth), 24/7, through this new Steady feature as part of the #SteadyTogether initiative.

We’d love to hear from you. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com.

With every new release we work hard to bring more value to our members through new features and improvements. We want to continue to help as many members as we can. Therefore we made it easy for you to share the Steady app with your friends, family and anyone you think Steady can help. We have also introduced phone verification to improve your account security.

We'd love to hear from you. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com.

We are excited to introduce a new feature that allows you to classify your transactions as income/not-income. This feature will help you clean your income data and get more accurate insights. We are also happy to announce that we have extended your access to 24/7 online medical visits through Steady Benefits until the end of September 2020.

We'd love to hear from you. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com.

Steady members with linked bank accounts can compare month over month income and transaction data through our new month view. Simply tap on the Month over month bar graph on the Income tab to see what's new. We also made performance optimizations to improve your experience.

We'd love to hear from you. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com.

We have introduced a new feature that will help you get better insights from your financial data. You can now save a lot of time by renaming multiple transactions at once. Renaming is easy. Search for keywords in your transactions, type in the display name of your choice and, save your preference. We will do the rest for you. Click on the "Get Better Insights" card on the Income tab to access the feature.

We'd love to hear from you. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com

We are excited to introduce Steady+ with smarter tools to help you find jobs faster and better manage your income! Upgrade to Steady+ to:
*Earn up to 2x more cash on Income Booster payouts
*View in-depth earnings and paycheck data for potential employers
*Receive personalized earning trends
*Access to tools to plan your financial future and export your financial data
...and even more coming soon!

We'd love to hear from you. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com.

If you are looking for a job, you'll love our new personalized work recommendations! Simply answer a few questions about your work experience in our Work survey, and we will recommend a curated list of jobs for you. Yes, it's that easy!
We want you to find the jobs that maximize your income, so now you can find out how much employers pay in your area and which ones are hiring!

We'd love to hear from you. Please send suggestions and feedback to support@steadyapp.com.

We want you to find the jobs that maximize your income, so now you can find out how much employers pay in your area and which ones are hiring!

Want to see how you're doing in real-time? With new and improved income insights, you can view personalized income trends across all your income sources, or tap on an individual source for a detailed breakdown of your progress.

Looking to maximize your earnings? Our new income comparison tool helps you compare your income across multiple sources so you can get the most out of your money. We've also made linking your bank account faster and easier than ever!
